data.text:
1. Netviewer Customer Success Story: Cipio Partners June 2006 Cipio Partners __________________________________________________________ From offices in Munich, London and San Jose, private equity firm Cipio Partners manages a global investment portfolio of more than 50 companies. As hands-on investor, Cipio actively assists portfo- lio companies in developing and implementing growth strategies, securing follow-on financings and preparing for successful exits. Teamwork and trust is key in all of the firm’s relationships. In or- der to ensure efficient and real-time communication internally and with its portfolio companies, Cipio recently decided to implement Netviewer’s one2meet solution. As a result, the firm has been able to realize immediate benefits including lower travel expenses, a more efficient meeting culture and the ability to set up ad-hoc on- line conference sessions from anywhere. __________________________________________________________ ::: The task at hand ::: How Netviewing works The private equity business requires a fundamental understanding of the mar- 1. 2. Netviewer Customer Success Story: Cipio Partners June 2006 ::: The solution Cipio carried out an extensive market analysis of available web collaboration applications to find the so- lution that would best meet the firm’s requirements. Netviewer was selected because of its strong fit with Cipio’s demand profile and the tool’s high marks on security. As market leader in Europe, Netviewer has earned numerous security certificates, including the ‘Secure Information Technology’ certification from Fraunhofer Institute, one of Germany’s leading tech- nology think tanks. Cipio was especially impressed by one2meet’s comprehensive fea- ture set and its unbeatable ease-of-use allowing users to set up web meetings virtually instantaneously. All it takes is an .exe file of less than 200kb and a randomly-generated meeting number and up to ten named users can initiate a real-time conference with an unlimited number of participants located around the globe. All Netviewer one2meet participants view the same screen and can communi- cate via an integrated VoIP function. “Thanks to the intuitive control panel and the simplicity of setting up web meetings, it is very easy to become familiar with the Netviewer software,” says Christoph Wedegaertner, Associate at Cipio Partners. ::: At a glance Since the deployment of Netviewer one2meet, Cipio has enjoyed a new way of  new, more efficient meeting meetings. Netviewer has been adopted rapidly by all team members and is now culture via the internet being used approximately 15 times a week. The result: significantly reduced travel expenses, faster agreement on documents and a more efficient way of quick involvement of customers  conducting real-time meetings without having to meet face-to-face. and partners in strategy development ____________________________________________________________________ no cost for licenses at customer  ::: Conclusion side no installation required  With Netviewer, Cipio selected a tool that is extremely well suited for all tasks saves time and travel expenses at hand: internal communication and efficient web meetings with portfolio com-  panies, investors and partners from all over the world. “Featuring comprehen- easy, intuitive use  sive functionality and high security, Netviewer is currently the most popular 128-bit encryption guarantees  solution for real-time collaboration in Europe”, explains Christoph Wedegaertner. highest safety “It offers significant advantages over traditional software applications which often require complex set-up and expensive licenses for all participants.” Erzbergerstr. 117 info@netviewer.net Netviewer GmbH D-76133 Karlsruhe www.netviewer.net Tel.: +49-721-354499-0 Fax: +49-721-354499-300
